data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 2, Daniel Nobre Bins has awarded Goianiense GO a corner.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Goianiense GO.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 6, Goianiense GO are coming forward and Matheus Vargas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 8, Coritiba take a 1-0 lead thanks to Matheus Galdezani.
Giovanni Augusto instrumental with a fine assist.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 10, Goianiense GO pushes forward through Willian Maranhao, whose finish on goal is saved.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Wilson.
Wilson for Coritiba is back on the field again.
In the minute 11, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Coritiba.
Goianiense GO drives forward and Natanael gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Coritiba.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO takes a corner from the right.
Ze Roberto (Goianiense GO) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 17, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Matheus Vargas (Goianiense GO) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Coritiba defenders.
Goianiense GO takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Coritiba throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 20, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards the home team a throw-in.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ze Roberto of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Daniel Nobre Bins has awarded Goianiense GO a corner.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Coritiba throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 33, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Goianiense GO's area.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Coritiba apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Matheus Galdezani. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Ze Roberto (Goianiense GO) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 41, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 44, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 44, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 45, Goianiense GO's Chico is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Hugo Moura is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Goianiense GO takes a corner from the right.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Chico is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Matheus Vargas (Goianiense GO) gets a yellow card.
Hugo Moura is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Martin Sarrafiore is replacing Giovanni Augusto for the home team.
Chico (Goianiense GO) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, Daniel Nobre Bins has awarded Goianiense GO a corner.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO's Chico misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 49, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Nathan Silva (Coritiba) has received a first yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ze Roberto for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 51, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Ze Roberto is back on his feet again.
In the minute 52, Goianiense GO drive upfield and Natanael gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Natanael (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Matheus Galdezani is booked for the home team.
In the minute 56, Goianiense GO takes a corner from the left.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Coritiba.
Janderson Santos de Souza is on a sub for Matheus Vargas for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 58, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Curitiba.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 59, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Eder Ferreira is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 62, Willian Maranhao (Goianiense GO) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Free kick Goianiense GO.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Goianiense GO.
The away team replace Gustavo Ferrareis with Matheuzinho.
In the minute 64, The away team replace Chico with Wellington Rato.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 66, Coritiba make their second substitution with Rodrigo Muniz replacing Ricardo Oliveira.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 67, Coritiba to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 69, Sabino of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 70, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Matheus Galdezani.
In the minute 74, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Matheus Galdezani, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Natanael is the substitute for Coritiba.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 76, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Coritiba throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Eder Ferreira is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 77, Gilvan (Goianiense GO) has replaced the possibly injured Eder Ferreira.
Goianiense GO make their fifth substitution with Junior Brandao replacing Willian Maranhao.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Goianiense GO's Matheuzinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Daniel Nobre Bins has awarded Goianiense GO a corner.
Goianiense GO pushes forward through Matheuzinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 81, Ezequiel Cerutti is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Ezequiel Cerutti (Coritiba) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Nathan.
In the minute 83, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Matheus Bueno is on a sub for Neilton for Coritiba.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 87, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards the away team a throw-in.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio Couto Pereira.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Curitiba.
Wellington Rato (Goianiense GO) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Coritiba just outside Goianiense GO's area.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Martin Sarrafiore's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
